name: Universe (itch) (SmallPhil)
description:
My first entry to the #1GAM challenge ! This month, the theme was death.

This "game" doesn't have any goals and is quite buggy but it works (I didn't optimize it at all so you'll need a decent computer). Any feedback is more than appreciated !

twitter: https://twitter.com/_smallphil

blog: http://smallphilgames.wordpress.com/

Have fun !
